sprint_goal: Establish Backend Foundations for Data Transformation & Extensibility
epic_coverage: Core Data Transformation Engine,Custom Connector and Licensing Framework,Database and Data Management
key_deliverables: Secure Jint sandbox wrapper; IConnector interface definition; Plug-in loader service; Initial relational DB schema.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate a script executing in the Jint sandbox via a unit test. Show the plug-in loader discovering a sample connector DLL.
success_criteria: Core engine and plug-in loader are functional and testable. Database schema is stable.
risk_factors: Complexity of `AssemblyLoadContext`; Security of Jint sandbox configuration.
mitigation_strategies: Dedicated security code review; Early integration testing of the plug-in loader with conflicting dependencies.

sprint_goal: Build Script Management API and Audit Infrastructure
epic_coverage: Transformation Script Management UI & API,Database and Data Management,Core Data Transformation Engine
key_deliverables: Full CRUD and versioning API for transformation scripts; MongoDB repository for audit logs; Backend for script preview API.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate creating, updating, and versioning a script via API calls (e.g., using Postman). Show audit logs being created in MongoDB for API actions.
success_criteria: All script management API endpoints are functional, secure, and audited. The preview API is ready for frontend integration.
risk_factors: Transactional complexity of versioning; MongoDB integration issues.
mitigation_strategies: Thorough integration testing of API endpoints; Use of in-memory providers for unit tests.
integration_windows: API ready for frontend team by end of sprint.

sprint_goal: Develop Script Editor UI and System Observability
epic_coverage: Transformation Script Management UI & API,Operations, Observability, and Deployment
key_deliverables: Rich script editor with Monaco; Three-pane resizable layout with live preview; Prometheus metrics endpoint.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate creating and editing a script in the UI. Show live preview of a script with sample data. Show metrics being scraped by a Prometheus instance.
success_criteria: The full script authoring and preview workflow is functional in the UI. The system is monitorable.
mitigation_strategies: Use established React wrappers for Monaco; Allocate time for configuration and bundling research.
integration_windows: Full-stack feature complete for script management.
burndown_target: Complete user-facing script editor and monitoring endpoint.

sprint_goal: Finalize Operational Readiness, Documentation, and Quality
epic_coverage: Core Data Transformation Engine,Custom Connector and Licensing Framework,Database and Data Management
key_deliverables: Performance benchmark test integrated into CI; Plug-in Development Kit (PDK) with documentation; Backup and Recovery documentation.
demo_objectives: Show the CI pipeline running the performance benchmark. Present the final PDK zip file and its contents. Walk through the backup/recovery documentation.
success_criteria: All operational documentation is complete and validated. Performance NFR is met and enforced by CI.
risk_factors: CI environment variability affecting performance tests.
mitigation_strategies: Run performance tests on dedicated, stable CI agents. Document expected hardware for benchmarks.
burndown_target: Achieve release readiness for all completed features.
